Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.jbake.launcher.Baker.bake(LaunchOptions, CompositeConfiguration)
    use Baker.bake(JBakeConfiguration) instead
    org.jbake.app.DBUtil.createDataStore(String, String)
    org.jbake.app.Oven.getConfig()
    org.jbake.parser.ParserEngine.parse(Configuration, File, String)
    use ParserEngine.parse(JBakeConfiguration, File) instead
    org.jbake.render.RenderingTool.render(Renderer, ContentStore, File, File, CompositeConfiguration)
    org.jbake.app.Oven.setConfig(CompositeConfiguration)
    org.jbake.app.Oven.setupPaths()
    There is no need for this method anymore. Validation is now part of the instantiation. Can be removed with 3.0.0.
    org.jbake.launcher.BakeWatcher.start(LaunchOptions, CompositeConfiguration)
    use BakeWatcher.start(JBakeConfiguration) instead
    org.jbake.app.DBUtil.updateSchema(ContentStore)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.jbake.template.AbstractTemplateEngine(Configuration, ContentStore, File, File)
    org.jbake.app.Asset(File, File, CompositeConfiguration)
    Use Asset.Asset(JBakeConfiguration) instead. Compatibility constructor. Creates an instance of Asset.
    org.jbake.app.Crawler(ContentStore, File, CompositeConfiguration)
    Use Crawler.Crawler(ContentStore, JBakeConfiguration) instead.

    Creates new instance of Crawler.
    org.jbake.app.configuration.DefaultJBakeConfiguration(CompositeConfiguration)
    use DefaultJBakeConfiguration.DefaultJBakeConfiguration(File, CompositeConfiguration) instead
    org.jbake.template.DelegatingTemplateEngine(CompositeConfiguration, ContentStore, File, File)
    Use DelegatingTemplateEngine.DelegatingTemplateEngine(ContentStore, JBakeConfiguration) instead.
    org.jbake.template.FreemarkerTemplateEngine(CompositeConfiguration, ContentStore, File, File)
    org.jbake.template.GroovyMarkupTemplateEngine(CompositeConfiguration, ContentStore, File, File)
    Use GroovyMarkupTemplateEngine.GroovyMarkupTemplateEngine(JBakeConfiguration, ContentStore) instead
    org.jbake.template.GroovyTemplateEngine(CompositeConfiguration, ContentStore, File, File)
    Use GroovyTemplateEngine.GroovyTemplateEngine(JBakeConfiguration, ContentStore) instead
    org.jbake.launcher.Init(CompositeConfiguration)
    use Init.Init(JBakeConfiguration) instead
    org.jbake.template.JadeTemplateEngine(CompositeConfiguration, ContentStore, File, File)
    org.jbake.app.Oven(File, File, boolean)
    Use Oven.Oven(JBakeConfiguration) instead Delegate c'tor to prevent API break for the moment.
    org.jbake.app.Oven(File, File, CompositeConfiguration, boolean)
    Use Oven.Oven(JBakeConfiguration) instead Creates a new instance of the Oven with references to the source and destination folders.
    org.jbake.app.Renderer(ContentStore, File, File, CompositeConfiguration)
    Use Renderer.Renderer(ContentStore, JBakeConfiguration) instead. Creates a new instance of Renderer with supplied references to folders.
    org.jbake.app.Renderer(ContentStore, File, File, CompositeConfiguration, DelegatingTemplateEngine)
    Use Renderer.Renderer(ContentStore, JBakeConfiguration, DelegatingTemplateEngine) instead. Creates a new instance of Renderer with supplied references to folders and the instance of DelegatingTemplateEngine to use.
    org.jbake.template.ThymeleafTemplateEngine(CompositeConfiguration, ContentStore, File, File)
    Use ThymeleafTemplateEngine.ThymeleafTemplateEngine(JBakeConfiguration, ContentStore) instead
